name: Sent a new Notifications
descriptionHtml:
### Endpoint for send new notification

Request payload must contain the following fields:

title: STRING
message: STRING
target_audience: STRING, options:
notification_type: STRING, options:
status: STIRNG, options:

Request:

POST - https://apiqa.inquitech.in/api/v1/notifications/send

raw 
  {
    "title": "My Notification",
    "message": "This is a test notification",
    "target_audience": "ALL",
    "notification_type": "PUSH",
    "status": "PUBLISHED"
}

Response:

200 - OK 

  {"status":200,"status_type":"success","message":"OK","count":1,"data":[{"created_at":"2022-09-11T16:26:56.230Z","updated_at":"2022-09-11T16:26:56.230Z","image":null,"read_by":null,"updated_by":null,"notification_id":38,"title":"My Notification","message":"This is a test notification","target_audience":"ALL","notification_type":"PUSH","status":"PUBLISHED","created_by":40}]}
